name: my-serverless-sequelize-project
description: This is a demo project for using the functionality of Serverless Sequelize Migrations

scripts.start-core: npx dotenv serverless offline start --config serverless-core.yml
scripts.start-tenant: npx dotenv serverless offline start --config serverless-tenant.yml
scripts.migrate-up-core: npx dotenv serverless migrations up --config serverless-core.yml
scripts.migrate-up-tenant: npx dotenv serverless migrations up --config serverless-tenant.yml
scripts.migrate-down-core: npx dotenv serverless migrations down --config serverless-core.yml
scripts.migrate-down-tenant: npx dotenv serverless migrations down --config serverless-tenant.yml
scripts.migrate-reset-core: npx dotenv serverless migrations reset --config serverless-core.yml
scripts.migrate-reset-tenant: npx dotenv serverless migrations reset --config serverless-tenant.yml
scripts.migrate-list-core: npx dotenv serverless migrations list --config serverless-core.yml
scripts.migrate-list-tenant: npx dotenv serverless migrations list --config serverless-tenant.yml
